name: Bow and Arrow PSX
description:
This is a PSX reboot of the classic 1992 DOS game 'From Bow and Arrow - In Search of the Greatest Archer', by John Di Troia. 

The archive contains a PSX executable that should be loaded in a an emulator (pcsx-redux, duckstation...) or on real hardware via serial, psio, xstation...

This project's sources are available on github : https://github.com/ABelliqueux/Bow_and_Arrow_psx
